item.title: If Full-Scale Revolution Started, Where Would You Be?
item.description: I want to start by letting the NSA know this is purely a thought experiment. We cool? Sweet. Thanks, bros. Now letâ€™s burn this place to the ground. Imagine we were in the middle of a full-scale, government upheaving, tea dumping, enterprise leveling, building burning revolution.
